thread.title: Anna Wintour and Lucky Blue Partied This Week
thread.title_full: Anna Wintour and Lucky Blue Partied This Week -- The Cut

author: Stephanie Eckardt
title: Anna Wintour and Lucky Blue Partied This Week
text:
View Slideshow Photo: BFA
Anna Wintour and Pierre-Yves Roussel's party for Donna Karan 's new book started the festivities early this week, drawing out Calvin Klein , Iman , and the Public School boys on a Monday. The next night, over in L.A., Gwyneth Paltrow, Nicole Richie, and Kate Hudson posed together at an event for La Mer, where Lucky Blue Smith and his model-sister, Pyper America , performed with their band, the Atomics. Back in New York, Bulgari celebrated its new exhibition with Liv Tyler and Alexa Chung , who fit practically a whole garden onto her gown by Valentino . Click through the slideshow to see those and more highlights from the week, including Mary-Kate Olsen , Marina Abramovic, Jessica Chastain, and Hamish Bowles.
BEGIN SLIDESHOW
